question: Who has been conferred with the lifetime achievement award for his contribution to statistics?
explanation:
Former Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor C Rangarajan has been conferred with the lifetime achievement award for his contribution to statistics.
The award has been given to him on the occasion of Statistics Day, which is celebrated on June 29 every year, to commemorate the birth anniversary of PC Mahalanobis, the 'father of Indian statisticsâ€™. C Rangarajan had served as the Chairman of the National Statistical Commission.
